name: DMT
description:
With this art I begin the series "Compressed Euphoria", in which I try to show my point of view on some intense emotional experiences I’ve been through.

C12H16N2

The feeling is something totally personal. In my case, I physically felt my body totally relaxed and out of control, I felt my mouth was open and I even thought I was peeing my pants.
With my eyes closed I saw something like a paradise, there were flowers and a white stone floor covered by clouds, then a human figure approached me and said "have more faith". I knew he was referring to my faith in me, in my choices and everything that was making me insecure at the time.

For me? Five stars!
